37namespace bitpit {
38
39// Stencil weight pool
40template<typename weight_t>
41class DiscreteStencilWeightPool
42{
43
44public:
45 DiscreteStencilWeightPool(std::size_t capacity = 128);
46
47 std::size_t size() const;
48 std::size_t capacity() const;
49 void clear(bool release);
50
51 weight_t retrieve();
52 void store(weight_t &&weight);
53 void store(std::vector<weight_t> *weights);
54
55private:
56 std::size_t m_capacity;
57 std::vector<weight_t> m_storage;
58
59};
60
61// Stream operators for the stencil class
62template<typename weight_t>
63class DiscreteStencil;
64
65template<typename weight_t>
66OBinaryStream & operator<<(OBinaryStream &buffer, const DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil);
67
68template<typename weight_t>
69IBinaryStream & operator>>(IBinaryStream &buffer, DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil);
70
78template <typename weight_t>
79class DiscreteStencil {
80
81template<typename W>
82friend OBinaryStream & (operator<<) (OBinaryStream &buffer, const DiscreteStencil<W> &stencil);
83template<typename W>
84friend IBinaryStream & (operator>>) (IBinaryStream &buffer, DiscreteStencil<W> &stencil);
85
86public:
87 long NULL_ID = - std::numeric_limits<long>::max();
88
89 typedef weight_t weight_type;
90
94 struct item_type {
95 long id;
96 weight_type weight;
97 };
98
99 DiscreteStencil(const weight_t &zero = weight_t());
100 DiscreteStencil(std::size_t nItems, const weight_t &zero = weight_t());
101 DiscreteStencil(std::size_t size, const long *pattern, const weight_t &zero = weight_t());
102 DiscreteStencil(std::size_t size, const long *pattern, const weight_t *weights, const weight_t &zero = weight_t());
103
104 virtual ~DiscreteStencil() = default;
105
106 void initialize(std::size_t nItems, const weight_t &zero = weight_t());
107 void initialize(std::size_t size, const long *pattern, const weight_t &zero = weight_t());
108 void initialize(std::size_t size, const long *pattern, const weight_t *weights, const weight_t &zero = weight_t());
109 void initialize(const DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &other);
110
111 void clear(bool release = false);
112
113 std::size_t size() const;
114
115 void resize(std::size_t nItems);
116 void reserve(std::size_t nItems);
117
118 long & getPattern(std::size_t pos);
119 const long & getPattern(std::size_t pos) const;
120 long * patternData();
121 const long * patternData() const;
122 void setPattern(std::size_t pos, long id);
123
124 weight_t & getWeight(std::size_t pos);
125 const weight_t & getWeight(std::size_t pos) const;
126 weight_t * weightData();
127 const weight_t * weightData() const;
128 void setWeight(std::size_t pos, const weight_t &weight);
129 void setWeight(std::size_t pos, weight_t &&weight);
130 void sumWeight(std::size_t pos, const weight_t &value, double factor = 1.);
131 void zeroWeight(std::size_t pos);
132
133 void setItem(std::size_t pos, long id, const weight_t &weight);
134 void setItem(std::size_t pos, long id, weight_t &&weight);
135 void sumItem(long id, const weight_t &value, double factor = 1.);
136 void appendItem(long id, const weight_t &weight);
137 void appendItem(long id, weight_t &&weight);
138
139 weight_t & getConstant();
140 const weight_t & getConstant() const;
141 void setConstant(const weight_t &value);
142 void setConstant(weight_t &&value);
143 void sumConstant(const weight_t &value, double factor = 1.);
144 void zeroConstant();
145
146 void sum(const DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &other, double factor);
147
148 void optimize(double tolerance = 1.e-12);
149 void renumber(const std::unordered_map<long, long> &map);
150 template<typename Mapper>
151 void renumber(const Mapper &mapper);
152 void addComplementToZero(long id);
153 void zero();
154
155 void display(std::ostream &out, double factor = 1.) const;
156
157 size_t getBinarySize() const;
158
159 weight_t & at(long id);
160 const weight_t & at(long id) const;
161
162 weight_t & operator[](long id);
163
164 DiscreteStencil<weight_t> & operator*=(double factor);
165 DiscreteStencil<weight_t> & operator/=(double factor);
166 DiscreteStencil<weight_t> & operator+=(const DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &other);
167 DiscreteStencil<weight_t> & operator-=(const DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &other);
168
169protected:
170 weight_t m_zero;
171 std::vector<long> m_pattern;
172 std::vector<weight_t> m_weights;
173 weight_t m_constant;
174
175 virtual void appendWeight(weight_t &&weight);
176 virtual void appendWeight(const weight_t &weight);
177
178 virtual void clearWeights(bool release);
179
180private:
181 template<typename W>
182 static void rawSumValue(const W &value, double factor, W *target);
183 template<typename W = weight_t, typename V = typename W::value_type, long unsigned int D = W::size_type, typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<std::array<V, D>, W>::value>::type * = nullptr>
184 static void rawSumValue(const std::array<V, D> &value, double factor, std::array<V, D> *target);
185 template<typename W = weight_t, typename V = typename W::value_type, typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<std::vector<V>, W>::value>::type * = nullptr>
186 static void rawSumValue(const std::vector<V> &value, double factor, std::vector<V> *target);
187
188 template<typename W>
189 static void rawCopyValue(const W &source, W *target);
190 template<typename W = weight_t, typename V = typename W::value_type, long unsigned int D = W::size_type, typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<std::array<V, D>, W>::value>::type * = nullptr>
191 static void rawCopyValue(const std::array<V, D> &source, std::array<V, D> *target);
192 template<typename W = weight_t, typename V = typename W::value_type, typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<std::vector<V>, W>::value>::type * = nullptr>
193 static void rawCopyValue(const std::vector<V> &source, std::vector<V> *target);
194
195 template<typename W>
196 static void rawMoveValue(W &&source, W *target);
197
198 weight_t * findWeight(long id);
199 const weight_t * findWeight(long id) const;
200
201 template<typename W>
202 bool isWeightNegligible(const W &weight, double tolerance = 1.e-12) const;
203 template<typename W = weight_t, typename V = typename W::value_type, long unsigned int D = W::size_type, typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<std::array<V, D>, W>::value>::type * = nullptr>
204 bool isWeightNegligible(const std::array<V, D> &weight, double tolerance = 1.e-12) const;
205 template<typename W = weight_t, typename V = typename W::value_type, typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<std::vector<V>, W>::value>::type * = nullptr>
206 bool isWeightNegligible(const std::vector<V> &weight, double tolerance = 1.e-12) const;
207
208};
209
218template<typename weight_t>
219class MPDiscreteStencil : public DiscreteStencil<weight_t>
220{
221
222public:
223 typedef DiscreteStencilWeightPool<weight_t> weight_pool_type;
224
225 MPDiscreteStencil(const weight_t &zero = weight_t());
226 MPDiscreteStencil(std::size_t nItems, const weight_t &zero = weight_t());
227 MPDiscreteStencil(std::size_t size, const long *pattern, const weight_t &zero = weight_t());
228 MPDiscreteStencil(std::size_t size, const long *pattern, const weight_t *weights, const weight_t &zero = weight_t());
229
230 void setWeightPool(weight_pool_type *pool);
231
232protected:
233 weight_pool_type *m_weightPool;
234
235 void appendWeight(const weight_t &weight) override;
236
237 void clearWeights(bool release) override;
238
239};
240
241// Declaration of the typdefs
242typedef DiscreteStencil<double> StencilScalar;
243typedef DiscreteStencil<std::array<double, 3>> StencilVector;
244typedef DiscreteStencil<std::vector<double>> StencilBlock;
245
246typedef MPDiscreteStencil<double> MPStencilScalar;
247typedef MPDiscreteStencil<std::array<double, 3>> MPStencilVector;
248typedef MPDiscreteStencil<std::vector<double>> MPStencilBlock;
249
250}
251
252// Operators for the stencil class
253template <typename weight_t>
254bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> operator*(const bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil, double factor);
255
256template <typename weight_t>
257bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> operator*(double factor, const bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil);
258
259template <typename weight_t>
260bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> operator/(const bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil, double factor);
261
262template <typename weight_t>
263bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> operator+(const bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil_A, const bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil_B);
264
265template <typename weight_t>
266bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> operator-(const bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil_A, const bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil_B);
267
268// Operators for the specializations
269template <typename V>
270typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>> operator*(const typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<V> &stencil, const std::array<V, 3> &vector);
271template <typename V>
272typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>> operator*(const std::array<V, 3> &vector, const typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<V> &stencil);
273
274// Functions for the specializations
275template <typename V>
276typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<V> dotProduct(const typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>> &stencil, const typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>>::weight_type &vector);
277template <typename V>
278void dotProduct(const typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>> &stencil, const typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>>::weight_type &vector, typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<V> *stencil_dotProduct);
279
280template <typename V>
281typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>> project(const typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>> &stencil, const std::array<V, 3> &direction);
282template <typename V>
283void project(const typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>> &stencil, const std::array<V, 3> &direction, typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>> *stencil_projection);
284
